title: Happy Birthday, Setsuna-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Rina-san, may I open my eyes yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Nope, not yet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Uuu, I’m getting curious. I want to see it already....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You can open them now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay.... U-, uwaaah, t-, this is!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I tried recreating the main character’s sword from one of your favorite anime with a 3D printer, Setsuna-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>A-, amazing.... This is so awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Fufu.... I’m glad you like it. Once again.... Happy birthday, Setsuna-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you so much, Rina-san! This feels like a dream!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I can’t wait to take a group photo with this sword at today’s party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
